name: Rosenkreuzstilette
description: Rosenkreuzstilette is a mega-action-platformer game in which you step into the shoes of Spiritia Rosenberg, a virtuous young woman caught on the wrong side of a revolution instigated by her closest friends.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Pentium 2.0 GHz or higher Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Direct3D-compatible video card with 64 megabytes of VRAM or more DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
